---
title: "Constrained Normal Sampling Code"
format: html
---

```{r}
# n = number of random samples 
# mu = mean of normal 
# sd = std. dev. normal 
# a = lower constraint (can be -Inf or a real number) 
# b = upper constraint (can be Inf or a real number)

rnorm_constrained <- function(n, mu, sd, a, b){
  u <- runif(n, pnorm(a, mu,sd), pnorm(b, mu, sd)) 
  qnorm(u, mu, sd) 
}
```
